verses.verse: Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Now, thou<WH859> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> wilt thou judge,<WH8199> wilt thou judge<WH8199> <WH853> the bloody<WH1818> city?<WH5892> yea, thou shalt show<WH3045> her<WH853> all<WH3605> her abominations.<WH8441>

Then say<WH559> thou, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> The city<WH5892> sheddeth<WH8210> blood<WH1818> in the midst<WH8432> of it, that her time<WH6256> may come,<WH935> and maketh<WH6213> idols<WH1544> against<WH5921> herself to defile<WH2930> herself.

Thou art become guilty<WH816> in thy blood<WH1818> that<WH834> thou hast shed;<WH8210> and hast defiled<WH2930> thyself in thine idols<WH1544> which<WH834> thou hast made;<WH6213> and thou hast caused thy days<WH3117> to draw near,<WH7126> and art come<WH935> even unto<WH5704> thy years:<WH8141> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> have I made<WH5414> thee a reproach<WH2781> unto the heathen,<WH1471> and a mocking<WH7048> to all<WH3605> countries.<WH776>
Those that be near,<WH7138> and those that be far<WH7350> from<WH4480> thee, shall mock<WH7046> thee, which art infamous<WH2931> <WH8034> and much<WH7227> vexed.<WH4103>
Behold, <WH2009> the princes<WH5387> of Israel,<WH3478> every one<WH376> were<WH1961> in thee to their power<WH2220> to<WH4616> shed<WH8210> blood.<WH1818>

In thee have they set light<WH7043> by father<WH1> and mother:<WH517> in the midst<WH8432> of thee have they dealt<WH6213> by oppression<WH6233> with the stranger:<WH1616> in thee have they vexed<WH3238> the fatherless<WH3490> and the widow.<WH490>
Thou hast despised<WH959> mine holy things,<WH6944> and hast profaned<WH2490> my sabbaths.<WH7676>

In thee are<WH1961> men<WH376> that carry tales<WH7400> to<WH4616> shed<WH8210> blood:<WH1818> and in thee they eat<WH398> upon<WH413> the mountains:<WH2022> in the midst<WH8432> of thee they commit<WH6213> lewdness.<WH2154>
In thee have they discovered<WH1540> their fathers'<WH1> nakedness:<WH6172> in thee have they humbled<WH6031> her that was set apart<WH5079> for pollution.<WH2931>

And one<WH376> hath committed<WH6213> abomination<WH8441> with<WH854> his neighbor's<WH7453> wife;<WH802> and another<WH376> hath lewdly<WH2154> defiled<WH2930> <WH853> his daughter-in-law;<WH3618> and another<WH376> in thee hath humbled<WH6031> <WH853> his sister,<WH269> his father's<WH1> daughter.<WH1323>

In thee have they taken<WH3947> gifts<WH7810> to<WH4616> shed<WH8210> blood;<WH1818> thou hast taken<WH3947> usury<WH5392> and increase,<WH8636> and thou hast greedily gained<WH1214> of thy neighbors<WH7453> by extortion,<WH6233> and hast forgotten<WH7911> me, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

Behold, <WH2009> therefore I have smitten<WH5221> mine hand<WH3709> at<WH413> thy dishonest gain<WH1215> which<WH834> thou hast made,<WH6213> and at<WH5921> thy blood<WH1818> which<WH834> hath been<WH1961> in the midst<WH8432> of thee.

Can thine heart<WH3820> endure,<WH5975> or<WH518> can thine hands<WH3027> be strong,<WH2388> in the days<WH3117> that<WH834> I<WH589> shall deal<WH6213> with thee? I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it, and will do<WH6213> it.
And I will scatter<WH6327> thee among the heathen,<WH1471> and disperse<WH2219> thee in the countries,<WH776> and will consume<WH8552> thy filthiness<WH2932> out of<WH4480> thee.
And thou shalt take thine inheritance<WH2490> in thyself in the sight<WH5869> of the heathen,<WH1471> and thou shalt know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> is to me become<WH1961> dross:<WH5509> all<WH3605> they are brass,<WH5178> and tin,<WH913> and iron,<WH1270> and lead,<WH5777> in the midst<WH8432> of the furnace;<WH3564> they are<WH1961> even the dross<WH5509> of silver.<WH3701>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> ye are all<WH3605> become<WH1961> dross,<WH5509> behold,<WH2009> therefore<WH3651> I will gather<WH6908> you into<WH413> the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

As they gather<WH6910> silver,<WH3701> and brass,<WH5178> and iron,<WH1270> and lead,<WH5777> and tin,<WH913> into<WH413> the midst<WH8432> of the furnace,<WH3564> to blow<WH5301> the fire<WH784> upon<WH5921> it, to melt<WH5413> it; so<WH3651> will I gather<WH6908> you in mine anger<WH639> and in my fury,<WH2534> and I will leave<WH5117> you there, and melt<WH5413> you.
Yea, I will gather<WH3664> you, and blow<WH5301> upon<WH5921> you in the fire<WH784> of my wrath,<WH5678> and ye shall be melted<WH5413> in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

As silver<WH3701> is melted<WH2046> in the midst<WH8432> of the furnace,<WH3564> so<WH3651> shall ye be melted<WH5413> in the midst<WH8432> thereof; and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> have poured out<WH8210> my fury<WH2534> upon<WH5921> you.
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> say<WH559> unto her, Thou<WH859> art the land<WH776> that<WH1931> is not<WH3808> cleansed,<WH2891> nor<WH3808> rained upon<WH1656> in the day<WH3117> of indignation.<WH2195>

There is a conspiracy<WH7195> of her prophets<WH5030> in the midst<WH8432> thereof, like a roaring<WH7580> lion<WH738> ravening<WH2963> the prey;<WH2964> they have devoured<WH398> souls;<WH5315> they have taken<WH3947> the treasure<WH2633> and precious things;<WH3366> they have made her many<WH7235> widows<WH490> in the midst<WH8432> thereof.

Her priests<WH3548> have violated<WH2554> my law,<WH8451> and have profaned<WH2490> mine holy things:<WH6944> they have put no difference<WH914> <WH3808> between<WH996> the holy<WH6944> and profane,<WH2455> neither<WH3808> have they showed<WH3045> difference between<WH996> the unclean<WH2931> and the clean,<WH2889> and have hid<WH5956> their eyes<WH5869> from my sabbaths,<WH4480> <WH7676> and I am profaned<WH2490> among<WH8432> them.

Her princes<WH8269> in the midst<WH7130> thereof are like wolves<WH2061> ravening<WH2963> the prey,<WH2964> to shed<WH8210> blood,<WH1818> and to destroy<WH6> souls,<WH5315> to<WH4616> get<WH1214> dishonest gain.<WH1215>

And her prophets<WH5030> have daubed<WH2902> them with untempered<WH8602> mortar, seeing<WH2374> vanity,<WH7723> and divining<WH7080> lies<WH3577> unto them, saying,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> when the LORD<WH3068> hath not<WH3808> spoken.<WH1696>

The people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> have used<WH6231> oppression,<WH6233> and exercised<WH1497> robbery,<WH1498> and have vexed<WH3238> the poor<WH6041> and needy:<WH34> yea, they have oppressed<WH6231> the stranger<WH1616> wrongfully.<WH3808> <WH4941>

And I sought<WH1245> for a man<WH376> among<WH4480> them, that should make up<WH1443> the hedge,<WH1447> and stand<WH5975> in the gap<WH6556> before<WH6440> me for<WH1157> the land,<WH776> that I should not<WH1115> destroy<WH7843> it: but I found<WH4672> none.<WH3808>

Therefore have I poured out<WH8210> mine indignation<WH2195> upon<WH5921> them; I have consumed<WH3615> them with the fire<WH784> of my wrath:<WH5678> their own way<WH1870> have I recompensed<WH5414> upon their heads,<WH7218> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
